column3:
MS10.1 - LSM: Reception and review of the LSM functionality
Deliverables: Integration code submitted , Comms, tutorials, guides, support

MS10.2 - LSM: Integration of LSM to the Node (as a beta feature)
Deliverables: Report demonstrating readiness

MS10.3 - LSM: The LSM feature integrated into the Node passing P&T and Testing
Deliverables: P&T and Testing report

MS10.4 - LSM: Releasing a Node version that includes LSM as a beta feature
Deliverables: New release in cardano-node github repo

MS10.5 - LSM: Support the beta-users, obtain feedback and release patches as needed.
Deliverables: Receive feedback from community and release patches as needed

MS10.6 - LSM: Upgrade LSM to 1.0
Deliverables: Node version release

MS11.1 - Ledger HD: Identifying the different data-sets that need to be moved from Memory to Drive.
Deliverables: Integration code submitted , Comms, tutorials, guides, support

MS11.2 - Ledger HD: Moving `Reward accounts` to Drive
Deliverables: Community report demonstrating readiness

MS11.3 - Ledger HD: Moving `InstantStake` to Drive
Deliverables: Community report demonstrating readiness

MS12.1 - Revised Stake Pool Incentive: Identify the current issues with Stakepool schemes
Deliverables: Community engagement links

MS12.2 - Revised Stake Pool Incentive: Review legacy and any new proposals
Deliverables: Community engagement links

MS12.3 - Revised Stake Pool Incentive: Design evaluation and estimate for build
Deliverables: Demonstration report (video or blog)

MS12.4 - Revised Stake Pool Incentive: Produce a demo/show and tell of the proposal to showcase to the community and dReps
Deliverables: Demonstration report (video or blog)

MS13.1 - Nested Transactions: Preparation work
Deliverables: CIP-0118 is merged. Necessary tech debt is resolved. New Dijkstra era is defined.

MS13.2 - Nested Transactions: Transaction definition
Deliverables: New ledger era is integrated all the way into cardano-node

MS13.3 - Nested Transactions: Ledger rules
Deliverables: Specification in Agda is mostly complete.

MS13.4 - Nested Transactions: Plutus Context
Deliverables: Ability to execute PlutusV4 script on a testnet.

MS13.5 - Nested Transactions: Testing and Conformance
Deliverables: cardano-node release that is fully capable of handling Nested Transactions in the new Dijkstra era
